name: Adera: Gold Bird Charm Earrings
description:
These modern drop earrings are made with recycled brass tube beads and birdinspired charms. These captivating earrings are handmade from melted down war weapons and recycled metals (brass, silver, copper) by HIV-positive women in Ethiopia. Made with sterling silver hooks. In addition to providing sustainable economic opportunities, Raven + Lily returns proceeds to fund healthcare and literacy programs for women and children in this community. Due to its unique nature, this piece will antique over time.

This clutch is designed by Raven + Lily and when you purchase it, you are contributing to empowering marginalised women.

Measurements: 2.75"

description:

Measurements: 12"x7"

This clutch is designed by Raven + Lily and when you purchase it, you are contributing to empowering marginalised women

name: Fabric Purse- Multiple Styles
description:
This sweet fabric purse was hand made in Thailand by the beautiful women of Sunshine House. You can read more about Sunshine House below, and the cause you are supporting when you buy this product.

Sunshine House is a social project run by Chiang Mai locals desiring to help women struggling in their community. the project seeks to support women who are engaged in prostitution with the vocational and psycho-social foundations necessary to allow for a different way of life. Most of the women the project supports are refugees fleeing for the conflict in Burma which means they most often come traumatised and know nothin of their families fate or whereabouts.

Sunshine house seeks to serve the women in their care through positive relationships that promote dignity, healing, and hope.

The women are trained in jewellery making and sewing skills so that they might be able to seek employment in such businesses once they move on from the care of Sunshine House.

During their time at sunshine house, the women are provided with medical care, counselling services, child care, and educational and skills training all at no cost. The products they make during their time at the project are the only regular source of funding that Sunshine House receives.

name: Purple & Black Geometric Necklace
description:
This geometric clay necklace has been lovingly hand crafted using polymer clay. Three beads are deep purple geometrically shaped, and three are black glittery beads and geometrically shaped.

The cord is made from cotton and can be adjustable so you can choose your desired length. Please allow 2-4 days for your order to be made, it will be posted as soon as it's completed! Sunshine House is a social project run by Chiang Mai locals desiring to help women struggling in their community. the project seeks to support women who are engaged in prostitution with the vocational and psycho-social foundations necessary to allow for a different way of life. Most of the women the project supports are refugees fleeing for the conflict in Burma which means they most often come traumatised and know nothin of their families fate or whereabouts.

Sunshine house seeks to serve the women in their care through positive relationships that promote dignity, healing, and hope.

The women are trained in jewellery making and sewing skills so that they might be able to seek employment in such businesses once they move on from the care of Sunshine House.

During their time at sunshine house, the women are provided with medical care, counselling services, child care, and educational and skills training all at no cost. The products they make during their time at the project are the only regular source of funding that Sunshine House receives.

name: Glass Thick Shake Straws- Large
description:
Somehow drinking through a glass straw makes everything taste better- not to mention you're doing your part for our environment! These heavy duty glass juice straws are large in size for a tall thick shake glass and are just what you need to motivate you to drink that fresh juice every morning!	

- Scientific Grade Borosilicate Glass
- Measures at 12mm x 12 inches
- Thick, Rugged and Durable
- Comfortable to Use 
- Dishwasher and Microwave Safe
- Safe for any temperature drink
- Hypoallergenic
- 100% non toxic
- Reusable
- Made in the United States (sweat shop free!)

Delivery is $6.00 as it costs a little extra to keep it safe. If you live in Brisbane or the Sunshine Coast, free delivery is offered with code 'GREATSOUTHEAST' .

name: Mduara Earrings - Tangerine
description:
These unique Mdura earrings were inspired by Nakasangola's ranching community. One of Uganda's most rural districts, Nakasangola is full of herds of ankole cattle taking over the streets and walkways at dusk. The Mduara design reflects the quiet, majestic beauty of these indigenous creatures. 

*Please note we only ship Australia wide at this stage.

Handmade paper beads. Gold colored glass beads.
